short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Computer Algebra System. THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MathPath helps students with Math by providing an on-page calculator that can solve problems from Algebra through Calculus. It provides 3 ways to obtain an answer: Go (for one shot answers), Step (to see the next step) and Explain (to obtain all steps with explanation).

It scans and imports Math expressions from the web site the student uses for learning like Khan Academy.
